oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Biodynamic approaches in research and development
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Raupp, Dr Joachim
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
"Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper deals with particular aspects of biodynamics in research and development. It describes the basic background (anthroposophy), the biodynamic preparations with respect to research questions, the need for education and training is pointed out. As a consequence of this situation international cooperation plays an important role.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Raupp, Dr Joachim (1999) Biodynamic approaches in research and development. In: Zanoli, R. and Krell, R. (Eds.) FAO Regional Office for Europe, FAO, Rome, REU Technical Series, no. 58, pp. 41-47.
